description: Agriculture & Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) has the requirement for the supply and delivery of one 125 HP tractor for their Brandon, Manitoba location.
full_summary:
### Solicitation No.: WS3679601180: Tractor Rental Services
#### Tender Closing Date: 10 November 2022, 14:00 HAE

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a tender for the supply and delivery of one 125 HP tractor for the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) at their location in Brandon, Manitoba.

**Solicitation Details**

* Solicitation Number: WS3679601180
* Publication Date: 6 October 2022
* Tender Closing Date: 10 November 2022, 14:00 HAE (Amended Closing Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 28 November 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: 31 March 2023

**Amendments**

A notice of amendment has been issued regarding the tender closing time. Please disregard the original closing times and submit all required supporting documentation and bids by 10 November 2022, 14:00 HAE. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Tender Description**

The AAFC requires the supply and delivery of one 125 HP tractor for their Brandon, Manitoba location.

**Procurement Method**

* Open Bidding (Competitive)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information**

To access the tender package and for any questions or concerns, please contact:
Lyland Wiebe (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
 
The tender package can be downloaded from Ariba Discovery at:
<a href="http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14297362?extsite=MTQyOTczNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==">http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14297362?extsite=MTQyOTczNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1
